  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020516</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020516</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Escucha a los emperadores romanos</string>
            <string language="en">Listen to the Roman emperors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören Sie zu den römischen Kaisern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoutez les empereurs romains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escute os emperors roman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ascolti gli imperatori romani</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακούστε τους ρωμαϊκούς αυτοκράτορες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">En esta actividad las imágenes de diferentes emperadores reflexionan en voz alta acerca de algunos aspectos más significativos de su reinado.</string>
            <string language="en">This activity shows pictures of the different Roman emperors thinking out loud about some of the most important aspects of their reign.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">emperadores</string>
            <string language="en">Emperors</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität zeigt Abbildungen der 
unterschiedlichen römischen Kaiser, die aus loud ungefähr einigen 
der wichtigsten Aspekte ihrer Herrschaft denken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité montre des images des différents
empereurs romains pensant hors fort environ de certains des aspects 
les plus importants de leur règne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade mostra retratos dos emperors roman
diferentes que pensam para fora ruidosamente de aproximadamente alguns
dos aspectos os mais importantes de seu reino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività mostra le immagini degli 
imperatori romani differenti che pensano verso l'esterno alto circa 
alcune delle funzioni più importanti del loro regno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα εμφανίζει ότι οι εικόνες των 
διαφορετικών ρωμαϊκών αυτοκρατόρων που σκέφτονται έξω δυνατών 
για μερικές από τις σημαντικότερες πτυχές του τους βασιλεύουν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kaiser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Empereurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emperors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imperatori</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρώμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτοκράτορες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
